Though the allegation against the accused is serious in nature, but on the basis of mere assumptions and presumptions and surmises no conviction can be sustain unless prosecution has been able to produce evidence worthy of credence.
15. This being the position, this court is of the considered view that prosecution miserably failed to establish the case against accused u/s 4 of POCSO Act.
decision:
Therefore, this court has no option but to acquit the accused from the offence u/s 4 of POCSO Act on the ground of insufficient evidence and set him at liberty forthwith.
